website_summaries.verdict: Economical option for small-business owners, as it’s compact and handles all the essential functions.
pros: Runs on four AAA batteries with decent battery life
Impressive printing capabilities, including print after correction and multi-copy reprints
Smaller footprint than other printing calculators, so it’s well-liked for home offices or use in co-working spaces
cons: Ink can dry out sooner than expected, and screen is a bit small for some people

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Excellent investment is compact and efficient. Very easy to use and with the versatility that you can use it with electric cable or you can take it wherever you want using batteries. I only see a fault I would have liked the screen to have better lighting. As for the rest it is good equipment
customer_reviews.author: Ana Figueroa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine and a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can read the display, even in low lit rooms. Very easy to use and load the paper. I need to use this nightly at my pizza shop for closing procedure. We would have alot of people all needing the adding machine at the same time. If you were lucky enough to find one the batteries were dead or it had no paper in it or it was out of ink etc. So a few of us purchased these adding machines, it makes the end of a hard day easier knowing I have something I can read and that works. I would highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: peter leboon

customer_reviews.title: Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not many people buy calculators now. The one delivered to me works great except the printer. no ink in it or dried out i guess. only reason i bought it and it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great to have, particularly when written proof of calculations are desired (e.g., tax returns)
customer_reviews.text: Repeated addition of long string of numbers on my playing-card size calculator would not have consistent results, so I decided a calculator with printout would help me learn where I was making my mistake(s). It did and has/will save me countless hours whenever such calculations are necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Donawick

customer_reviews.title: Daily Use Calculator for the win
customer_reviews.text: This Casio HR-10RC printing calculator is your go-to machine. It will do everything you want and things you will probably never use. The features are rich and at this price point you can not lose. Remember those old adding machines? Well, you would have to be older than 40 years old to remember how they worked, but this little baby does it all. Calculates what you want and prints it out on a receipt tape. I have worked finance over the past 10 years and this is my most favorite calculator. I have it on my desk at my home too so I can not lose a step with work.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT SMALL HOME USE CALCULATOR!!
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED IN ONE DAY, TO REPLACE MY OLD CALCULATOR THAT DIED!! JUST FINE FOR MY HOME NEEDS!!....THANK YOU AND A BEST BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I will not recommend this for anyone to buy I only use it once a month to do my treasures report for my Nonprofit group. No I have to go buy another one so that I can finish some of the tax papers information for the group. Please do not buy it only lasted a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need in my home office size is perfect. Easy to see and use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use it all of sudden stopped working. Makes math errors etc. I changed the batteries and still having issues. Now sits in my trash can.
customer_reviews.author: JIM C.

customer_reviews.title: Non-responsive decimal key
customer_reviews.text: I had earlier version, HR-8TE to be exact, which still works great. But this HR-10RC caused me problems downtown. The decimal key occasionally fails to record the touch. Of course the entire tape is then off, causing me major problems. I dug my HR-8TE out of the donation box, out of retirement, and I'm back in business. Reason I left the HR-8TE? . . . discoloration - didn't look good on desk with other all black machinery. Well, function trumps appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ether Hero

customer_reviews.title: Great small calculator
customer_reviews.text: Great small calculator. Nice to have a print function. Normal spooled printable calculator paper fits (don’t need to buy a special size).
customer_reviews.author: LadySadie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is frustrating to use because of its small size. You inevitably hit the wrong button when adding up alot of items and you've got to start all over. And the instructions are difficult to understand. Wish I would have bought a larger size and one that is easier to understand how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Item that I received was missing parts, so I could not use it. I bought it because I have a friend who has one. It is awesome. I'm going to buy one from another seller. You'll like one that works. Still have not received my refund
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this as my 5 year old larger calculator died... not to small for fingers, some features in using it are different but basically much. Love the compact size for my desk takes up much less space.
customer_reviews.author: BLUESKYS4ME

customer_reviews.title: Love compact size with paper tape.
customer_reviews.text: However, the tape slides right off the pin every time I lift it up to bring it close to use it. Please add a rubber washer to slip on the end of the paper roll pin to keep it from flying off all the time. Otherwise, I love the calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Kate D

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator
customer_reviews.text: The best calculator I’ve owned. Easy to use and easy to read the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Donelle

customer_reviews.title: Great printing calculator
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous Casio printing calculator which stopped working after years of service and knew I wanted another one. This one is a little louder when using than my first one but, other than that, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Tax time
customer_reviews.text: I need a printing calculator once a year when preparing my tax return information. This fits the bill. No complaints except that my taxes are too high!
customer_reviews.author: GradyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Working from home now, but didnt want to invest in another full size calculator. This little thing is perfect for what i needed! I love the reprint feature.
customer_reviews.author: polar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little adding machine!
customer_reviews.text: Compact size but many features. Love it, in my use I need to run 2 identical tapes. This machine has a key to run an identical tape without inputting all the data.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped quickly and has a lot of features. The print is clear. The reprint feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Printer sticks and keeps printing
customer_reviews.text: Nice little calculator but buttons stick and printer sometimes keeps going. You have to make sure it powers off if not will run all day. Other than that it's ok
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Calculator!
customer_reviews.text: So happy they still make these since I needed it for work and a cell calculator doesn't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: V. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS A REPLACEMENT FOR ON JUST LIKE IT I HAVE HAD FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator easy to use, easy to change paper and batteries and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny White

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Value
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to use. Especially like the compact and slim design, since it takes less space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: koop320

customer_reviews.title: Super sensetive buttons
customer_reviews.text: I love it but for the fact the buttons are supper sensitve .. I have to get used to that but other wise so far so good..
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Casio  Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Great little calculator /easy to use /and very very fast.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD TURNBULL

customer_reviews.title: no ink
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without an ink roller, and I cannot find anywhere to purchase the roller that fits it. I bought this calculator because I wanted to see a printout of my work, so it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Calculator won't turn on after a month of use. "On" button not functioning.
customer_reviews.author: JAGA

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right for our desk and printed buttons are all very nice. Just what we wanted in a desk calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totals
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Works great for the work I do.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Brother is high quality
customer_reviews.text: Performs just as it should. I had my last model for eons
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Refill supplies
customer_reviews.text: Where can I purchase refill paper roll as well as ink. If I can’t this is useless
customer_reviews.author: Rose McMahon

customer_reviews.title: The keys are too difficult to punch for bigger projects
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it at all. For a few dollars more I got a Sharp real calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Manchester

customer_reviews.title: How do we get paper refills
customer_reviews.text: The product was great but when I went on to order more paper for the machine Amazon does not stock it
customer_reviews.author: annette georgio

customer_reviews.title: life save
customer_reviews.text: compact and great product. works great and its easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Tinajero

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is horrible to use. I am going to throw it away!
customer_reviews.author: irving tieman

customer_reviews.title: Adding up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, works great for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Torres

product_meta.title: Casio HR-10RC Printing Calculator
product_meta.description: Style:Printing Calculator12-digit printing calculator features a large, easy-to-read LCD that showcases sharp digits to help prevent reading errors. Large keys are appropriately positioned for fast, accurate data entry to help minimize input errors. Compact size offers convenient portability to keep this calculator with you wherever you need. Dual-power operation lets you use plug directly into an outlet or use four AA batteries for on-the-go use. Printing calculator also offers 150-step check and edit, after-print-function, re-print function, currency conversion, profit calculation, tax calculation, independent memory, double-zero key and more.
feature_bullets: After print allows you to print after correction
Re-print multiple copies.Print Speed - Lines / Seconds:1.6

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars353 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
